name: Five-Cheese Pizza Cupcakes
author: Tegan Gordon
summary: Muffin-sized pizza cupcakes with a cheesy flavor.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, or more as needed
1 (13.8 ounce) can refrigerated pizza dough (such as Pillsbury®)
¼ cup shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
directions: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Use the oil to lightly grease the cups of two 12-cup muffin tins
Take pizza dough and put enough in each cup to cover the bottom and 1/3 to 1/2 up the sides
Sprinkle garlic salt over top, then spoon 1 tablespoon sauce onto each crust
Layer toppings on the sauce: pepperoni, bell pepper, and onion
Add about 1 tablespoon Mexican cheese to each and continue layering toppings: salami, more bell pepper, and more pepperoni
Add a layer of mozzarella cheese and Cheddar cheese
Continue layering toppings until muffin cups are slightly overfull; the toppings should not overflow during cooking, they will settle into the tin
Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes
Remove from the oven and cool in the tins for 2 minutes before serving
